title: For The Princess Who Will Disappear - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Absent Parents   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Charismatic Protagonist   Contracts   Fallen Nobility   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Identity Crisis   Nobles   Poor to Rich
author: 서담연
description:
“I will make you a princess.” 

Sasha lived in an alley with pickpocketers. She was suspected of being Princess Anastasia who disappeared a long time ago, due to the sale of the necklace she had when she was a child

“It will be a disaster if you turn out to be a scammer.” 

'I will take responsibility.'

'How?'

'Is my title not enough?'

Buying time until the real Anastasia appears. That was the “deal” between the duke and her. 

'You said you'd let me go when we’re done. What if you really like me?'

'Nevertheless, I will not do anything against your will.'

But somehow, the duke became sincere to her. 

'I'm already yours.'

She should disappear. 

That way, she’ll live.
>
